name: Chips
description: Crispy potato slices, lightly salted.

name: Pretzels
description: Crunchy twisted bread with a salty exterior.

name: Granola Bar
description: A sweet and chewy snack made with oats, honey, and dried fruit.

name: Popcorn
description: Light, fluffy kernels, usually salted or buttered.

name: Fruit Snacks
description: Sweet, chewy treats made from fruit puree.

name: Cookies
description: Sweet baked treats, often with chocolate chips or nuts.

name: Brownie
description: A rich, chocolatey square of baked goodness.

name: Rice Cakes
description: Crunchy, puffed rice, available in different flavors.

name: Trail Mix
description: A mix of nuts, dried fruits, and sometimes chocolate or seeds.

name: Nuts
description: A variety of crunchy and salty nuts like almonds, peanuts, and cashews.

name: Cheese Sticks
description: Cheese in stick form, perfect for snacking.

name: Carrot Sticks
description: Fresh and crunchy carrot sticks, perfect for dipping.

name: Apple Slices
description: Fresh, crisp apple slices, often paired with peanut butter.

name: Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered yogurt with fruits and granola.

name: Bagel Bites
description: Mini bagels with melted cheese, often served with pizza toppings.

name: Energy Balls
description: Small, no-bake treats made with oats, nut butter, and sweeteners.

name: Fruit Salad
description: A mix of fresh fruits, sometimes drizzled with honey.

name: Smoothie
description: A blended drink made from fruits, yogurt, and sometimes protein powder.

name: Cottage Cheese
description: A creamy, mild cheese that pairs well with fruits or crackers.

name: Pita Chips
description: Crispy chips made from baked pita bread, often served with dip.

name: Cheese Curds
description: Fresh, squeaky cheese, often enjoyed with a dipping sauce.

name: Chocolates
description: Sweet, creamy candies made with chocolate, sometimes filled.

name: Banana Chips
description: Crispy, sweet chips made from dried bananas.

name: Pop-Tarts
description: Sweet, frosted pastries with a fruit or chocolate filling.

name: Dried Fruit
description: Dehydrated fruit, often sweet and chewy.

name: Beef Jerky
description: Dried and seasoned strips of beef, perfect for a savory snack.

name: Veggie Chips
description: Crunchy chips made from vegetables like sweet potatoes and zucchini.

name: Hummus and Veggies
description: Creamy hummus served with crunchy vegetables like cucumbers and peppers.

name: Chocolate-Covered Almonds
description: Almonds coated in smooth chocolate.

name: Oatmeal Cookies
description: Chewy cookies made with oats and sometimes raisins or chocolate.

name: Muffins
description: Soft and fluffy baked goods, often flavored with fruits or chocolate.
